member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32
member.summary: Methods and data types found in Crypt32.dll.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT
member.summary: The CERT_CONTEXT structure contains both the encoded and decoded representations of a certificate. A certificate context returned by one of the functions defined in Wincrypt.h must be freed by calling the CertFreeCertificateContext function. The CertDuplicateCertificateContext function can be called to make a duplicate copy (which also must be freed by calling CertFreeCertificateContext).

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT.dwCertEncodingType
member.summary: Type of encoding used. It is always acceptable to specify both the certificate and message encoding types by combining them with a bitwise-OR operation.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT.pbCertEncoded
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the encoded certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT.cbCertEncoded
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the encoded certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT.pCertInfo
member.summary: The address of a CERT_INFO structure that contains the certificate information.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_CONTEXT.hCertStore
member.summary: A handle to the certificate store that contains the certificate context.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_EXTENSION
member.summary: The CERT_EXTENSION structure contains the extension information for a certificate, Certificate Revocation List (CRL) or Certificate Trust List (CTL).

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_EXTENSION.pszObjId
member.summary: Object identifier (OID) that specifies the structure of the extension data contained in the Value member. For specifics on extension OIDs and their related structures, see X.509 Certificate Extension Structures.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_EXTENSION.fCritical
member.summary: If TRUE, any limitations specified by the extension in the Value member of this structure are imperative. If FALSE, limitations set by this extension can be ignored.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_EXTENSION.Value
member.summary: A CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB structure that contains the encoded extension data. The cbData member of Value indicates the length in bytes of the pbData member. The pbData member byte string is the encoded extension.e

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_INFO structure contains the information of a certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.dwVersion
member.summary: The version number of a certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.SerialNumber
member.summary: A BLOB that contains the serial number of a certificate. The least significant byte is the zero byte of the pbData member of SerialNumber. The index for the last byte of pbData, is one less than the value of the cbData member of SerialNumber. The most significant byte is the last byte of pbData. Leading 0x00 or 0xFF bytes are removed. For more information, see CertCompareIntegerBlob.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.SignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: A CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER structure that contains the signature algorithm type and encoded additional encryption parameters.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.Issuer
member.summary: The name, in encoded form, of the issuer of the certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.NotBefore
member.summary: Date and time before which the certificate is not valid. For dates between 1950 and 2049 inclusive, the date and time is encoded Coordinated Universal Time (Greenwich Mean Time) format in the form YYMMDDHHMMSS. This member uses a two-digit year and is precise to seconds. For dates before 1950 or after 2049, encoded generalized time is used. Encoded generalized time is in the form YYYYMMDDHHMMSSMMM, using a four-digit year, and is precise to milliseconds. Even though generalized time supports millisecond resolution, the NotBefore time is only precise to seconds.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.NotAfter
member.summary: Date and time after which the certificate is not valid. For dates between 1950 and 2049 inclusive, the date and time is encoded Coordinated Universal Time format in the form YYMMDDHHMMSS. This member uses a two-digit year and is precise to seconds. For dates before 1950 or after 2049, encoded generalized time is used. Encoded generalized time is in the form YYYYMMDDHHMMSSMMM, using a four-digit year, and is precise to milliseconds. Even though generalized time supports millisecond resolution, the NotAfter time is only precise to seconds.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.Subject
member.summary: The encoded name of the subject of the certificate.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.SubjectPublicKeyInfo
member.summary: A CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO structure that contains the encoded public key and its algorithm. The PublicKey member of the CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO structure contains the encoded public key as a CRYPT_BIT_BLOB, and the Algorithm member contains the encoded algorithm as a CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.IssuerUniqueId
member.summary: A BLOB that contains a unique identifier of the issuer.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.SubjectUniqueId
member.summary: A BLOB that contains a unique identifier of the subject.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: An array of pointers to CERT_EXTENSION structures, each of which contains extension information about the certificate.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO structure contains a public key and its algorithm.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO.Algorithm
member.summary: CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER structure that contains the public key algorithm type and associated additional parameters.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO.PublicKey
member.summary: BLOB containing an encoded public key.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER
member.summary: The CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER structure specifies an algorithm used to encrypt a private key. The structure includes the object identifier (OID) of the algorithm and any needed parameters for that algorithm. The parameters contained in its CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB are encoded.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER.pszObjId
member.summary: An OID of an algorithm.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPT_ALGORITHM_IDENTIFIER.Parameters
member.summary: A BLOB that provides encoded algorithm-specific parameters. In many cases, there are no parameters. This is indicated by setting the cbData member of the Parameters BLOB to zero.

member.name: T:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPTOAPI_BLOB
member.summary: The BLOB structure contains an arbitrary array of bytes. The structure definition includes aliases appropriate to the various functions that use it.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPTOAPI_BLOB.cbData
member.summary: A DWORD variable that contains the count, in bytes, of data.

member.name: F:Vanara.PInvoke.Crypt32.CRYPTOAPI_BLOB.pbData
member.summary: A pointer to the data buffer.
